channel.title: How do i join other servers?
channel.description: how come i cant join other servers?? ill try and join urs but whats ur server??

item.title: How do i join other servers?
item.dc:creator: @Nashiu Nashiu
item.description:
@Nashiu wrote:

Well this is a question that’s easy enough and fast enough to explain that you don’t need to link him the website.

You find a server that you’d like to play, and you register on the server’s website. If you don’t need to go to a web page/website to register, you just type in the server IP and type in the username and password you want and it should create your character.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i join other servers?
